content.body: Maybe we should make the agenda deadline always be on the same weekday, rather than 10 days before the first day
It makes it easy to track it and plan around it
* It makes it easier to track it and plan around it

m.new_content.body: It makes it easier to track it and plan around it

content.body: Ah, like always a Friday? That would mean a variable number of days from the meeting, but within a small range, since the meetings always start M-W. I'd approve of that.
"Agenda deadline is two Fridays before the meeting"
almost every plenary starts on a tuesday, so the 10 days is the same weekday usually - this one's an anomaly
Half of them start on mondays
